name: Angry Tank(incomplete version)
description:
Angry Tank(incomplete version) is a tank shoot game. This game is the survival mode. The goal of the play is to survive as long as possible. Because all the enemy tanks duplicate themselves every 30 seconds. The world map is huge, the player controls a hero tank that need to destroy the enemy tanks as many as possible. The enemy tanks patrols in different locations while the screen only show a very small part of the world. The player need to drive around to find the remaining enemy tanks and shoot them to prevent the duplication.

We are still developing the game (sounds, AI agents, scoring system need to be added).

Keyboard WASD keys to control the direction, move the mouse to control the shooting direction, click mouse left to shoot
